description:
The address the [place](./place.json) is located at. Localized because some parts like the municipality or street address can be different in Dutch, French, German and/or English.

Requires at least one locale, specifically the one defined in the [mainLanguage](./place-mainLanguage.json) of the place.

**Only add a localized version if it's an official variant!**
title: place.address

nl.description: Address localized in Dutch. Usually the locality and street address can be candidates to be localized.

addressCountry.description: Country code in the ISO-3166 format. For example `BE`.

addressLocality.description: Municipality of the address in the relevant locale, for example `Brussel` for `nl`.

postalCode.description: Postal code of the municipality, for example `1000`. Formatted as a string because some international postal codes use letters.

streetAddress.description: Street address in the relevant locale, for example `Wetstraat 1` for `nl`.
